ActJudges Act
SubjectDorothy Lomas ** WIDOW'S ANNUITY ** The Hon. M. Earl Lomas
PrecisGranting of an annuity to DOROTHY LOMAS, widow of the Honourable M. Earl Lomas, a Justice of the Court of Queen's Bench of Alberta, effective September 27, 2009.
AttachmentsAttachment
